item.title: PLANT COMPANION
item.description: Abstract This pictorial proposes a human-plant interactive design called Plant Companion as a solution to provide mental support and combat loneliness for people living alone. The design combines the benefits of pants, and interaction and enhances these effects through Arduino, an electronic platform that utilizes sensors to create interactive prototypes. Plant Companion can read environmental data and also detect the presence of users and will provide visual, motion, and sound feedback.
